solutions.name: ABE
solutions.description: Legacy smart meter maintanance and emergency booking platform, due to be replaced by booking orchestration

solutions.name: Account Health Discovery Store
solutions.description: A data store providing a customer-centric view of account health, incorporating features from billing, metering, and payments for both Pay Monthly and Pay As You Go customers. Includes a 0-100 Account Health Index for a simplified overview.

solutions.name: Arrears Balance
solutions.description: Maintains an accurate, real-time record of a customer's outstanding debt or arrears balance.

solutions.name: Atom
solutions.description: API interface to ESG

solutions.name: Backbilling
solutions.description: Automate the process of backbilling to remove the manual process of backbill writeoffs, hold removals, and memos upload

solutions.name: Backbilling Calculator
solutions.description: Calculate write off amount for backbilled customer

solutions.name: Collection Segmentation
solutions.description: A customer segmentation model which aims to be used to determine optimal treatment pathways in collections.

solutions.name: Collections
solutions.description: Manages the process of recovering outstanding customer debt through automated workflows and data synchronization.

solutions.name: Collections Status
solutions.description: API on Collections State / History for a Customer / Accounts

solutions.name: Credit Risk
solutions.description: Assesses the financial viability of customers to manage the risk associated with providing products and services.

solutions.name: Customer Mode Switch
solutions.description: Switch customers from PAYM to PAYG or PAYG to PAYM, including bills, debt, etc.

solutions.name: DD Cancellations Model
solutions.description: A machine learning model that produces a daily probability score predicting the likelihood of a customer cancelling their Direct Debit within the next three months.

solutions.name: Debt Decisioning
solutions.description: Determines the optimal strategy for engaging with customers who have entered the collections process.

solutions.name: Debtsense Signup
solutions.description: Debtsense Signup and hydration of an Income & Expenditure 3rd party

solutions.name: Deeper Complaints Diagnostics
solutions.description: An ad-hoc process for conducting deep-dive analysis into complaint reasons, iteratively creating sub-categories and generating single-sentence summaries for richer insights.

solutions.name: Delinquency Model
solutions.description: A predictive model that identifies customers who are likely to become delinquent on their payments.

solutions.name: Finals Risk Repayment Propensity Score
solutions.description: A machine learning model that produces a daily prediction of repayment risk for customers with final bills, identifying potential bad debt.

solutions.name: First Time Debtors Segmentation
solutions.description: Identifies customers who are experiencing debt for the first time, allowing for tailored support and intervention.

solutions.name: Live Risk Repayment Propensity Score
solutions.description: A machine learning model that generates a daily prediction of repayment risk for the active OVO customer base, identifying accounts where debt may remain outstanding after six months.

solutions.name: MESCAL Meter Escalation
solutions.description: Auditable log of contact events for non-paying customers, preventing right off after 12 months and compensation.

solutions.name: Nexum Journey Risk and Support Needs
solutions.description: Provides specialised risk journey segments for the Nexum collections process, including the creation of a control group for performance measurement.

solutions.name: Nexum2OVO
solutions.description: Daily data pipeline replicates Nexum Data in to OVO BQ

solutions.name: On-Demand Segmentation
solutions.description: Segments On-Demand customers into distinct groups, primarily based on their payment cycles and behaviours.

solutions.name: OVO Extra Support
solutions.description: OVO Extra Support Provides extra support for bills to eligible customers

solutions.name: OVO2Nexum
solutions.description: Daily data pipeline hydrates third part Nexum

solutions.name: PAYG Agent Experience
solutions.description: Provides tools for support agents to manage Pay As You Go (PAYG) customer accounts, including a dedicated portal for applying support credit, batch processing capabilities, and PAN reconciliation.

solutions.name: PAYG Billing
solutions.description: Handles billing-related processes for Pay As You Go (PAYG) customers, i.e the generation of mandatory annual statements.

solutions.name: PAYG BOL Communication
solutions.description: Handles communication with ESG's BOL for Pay As You Go (PAYG) scenarios, and processes solicited and unsolicited response messages.

solutions.name: PAYG Compliance
solutions.description: Monitors the supply status of Pay As You Go (PAYG) meters, handling disconnection alerts and triggering welfare checks for self-disconnected customers to ensure regulatory compliance.

solutions.name: PAYG Mobile Application
solutions.description: Provides Pay As You Go customers with a mobile application to manage their account, top up credit, and monitor usage.

solutions.name: PAYG Onboarding
solutions.description: Manages the onboarding process for Pay As You Go (PAYG) customers, including the generation and distribution of Payment Authentication Numbers (PANs), keys, and cards for both smart and traditional meters.

solutions.name: PAYG Payments
solutions.description: Manages payment processing and reconciliation for Pay As You Go (PAYG) customers by ingesting and enriching payment files from third-party vendors like Paypoint and Payzone.

solutions.name: PAYG Reconciliation
solutions.description: Reconciles payments made by Pay As You Go customers against their energy consumption to ensure accurate account balances

solutions.name: PAYG Usage
solutions.description: A collection of services that manage Pay As You Go (PAYG) customer usage, providing meter balance history, processing top-ups, handling smart meter balance data, and serving as a gateway to the Paypoint network.

solutions.name: Propensity to Cure
solutions.description: A propensity model which estimates the probability that an account will cure from collections (i.e. pay off their debt or agree a payment plan).

solutions.name: Reason for DDR Communication Analysis
solutions.description: Provides a Tableau insights report analysing the reasons for customer contact following a Direct Debit Request communication, including customer experience metrics like CSAT.

solutions.name: Recovery Option
solutions.description: Assesses eligibility for applied debt recovery options (warrant/mode switch)

solutions.name: Regular Contactors Segmentation
solutions.description: Segments customers who frequently contact OVO with low-complexity or simple needs, enabling targeted communication strategies.

solutions.name: Split Balances
solutions.description: Calculate split balance debt as a precurser to recovery

solutions.name: Support Needs Segmentation
solutions.description: A rule-based segmentation model that identifies financially vulnerable customers who are more likely to require support, based on data points such as affordability, PSR markers, and payment support interactions

solutions.name: Threat of Escalation Prioritisation Score
solutions.description: A scoring model that flags contacts at risk of escalation by combining factors such as sentiment, explicit mentions of escalation, and a propensity to escalate.

solutions.name: Transparity
solutions.description: Previously Ballard Chalmers, now used for debt recovery

solutions.name: Utility Usage Estimation
solutions.description: Estimates customer energy consumption when actual meter readings are unavailable, ensuring continuous and fair billing.

solutions.name: Warm Home Discount
solutions.description: Administers the Warm Home Discount scheme, applying financial support to eligible customer bills during the winter months.
